text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea Thanks so much for sharing! I feel exactly the same, and it’s good to know I’m not the only one. I always assumed that other women were fine with wearing the tech shirts. For me it’s also the problem that all the shirts are too big (and shapeless) and make me feel like a kid haha

author.name: Kaya Weers
author.description: Java developer with a great love for innovation | likes to play soccer and travel the world
